game_description: Laser Escape is a Free to Play Arcade Music game. The goal is to dodge the lasers coming towards you until the song ends. Gameplay mostly affected by your body's moves. For feeling the beat through your bones! There are three collectible special abilities. These are: Health Point: An extra health point. Time Slowdown: When used, everything is going to move like a turtle. Shield: A field that protects you from lasers. (Attention! It destroys collectibles too.)
review_1: It's fun but why does it stutter so much when you move? It's vomit inducing.
